item.title: Book Arrival: Working Effectivly With Legacy Code
item.author: jakob.kuelzer@gmail.com (Jakob Külzer)
item.description: I had this book on my wishlist for quite a while, but never thought I needed it. But then it was warmly recommended to me during a fantastic OOP Workshop with Sandi Metz. If Sandi recommends it, it must be good. Excited to dive into this one: Working Effectivly with Legacy Code by Michael C. Feathers
